data.partBlankContent: I feel very lucky that I am able to work from home. All d__ long I answer ph___ calls a__ have vi___ meetings. Most o_ my wo__ is do__ online, but I also ma__ in so__ of m_ files t_ a nati____ office. The best part of working from home is waking up late!
data.fullContent: I feel very lucky that I am able to work from home. All day long I answer phone calls and have video meetings. Most of my work is done online, but I also mail in some of my files to a national office. The best part of working from home is waking up late!
data.answer: 我感到很幸运，我能在家工作。我整天都在接电话和开视频会议。我的大部分工作都是在网上完成的，但我也会把一些文件邮寄到一个全国性的办公室。在家工作最好的部分就是起床晚！
